00017 #include "MisrFileQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include <hdf.h>
00020 #include <mfhdf.h>
00021 
00035 MTKt_status MtkFileToPath( const char *filename, 
00036                int *path              )
00037 {
00038   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00039   int32 sid = FAIL;     /* HDF SD file identifier */
00040   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00041   intn hdfstatus;       /* HDF return status */
00042 
00043   if (filename == NULL)
00044     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00045 
00046   sid = SDstart(filename, DFACC_READ);
00047   if (sid == FAIL)
00048     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_SDSTART_FAILED);
00049 
00050   /* Read path number. */
00051   status = MtkFileToPathFid(sid, path);
00052   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00053 
00054   hdfstatus = SDend(sid);
00055   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00056     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_SDEND_FAILED);
00057   sid = FAIL;
00058 
00059   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00060 
00061 ERROR_HANDLE:
00062   if (sid != FAIL) {
00063     hdfstatus = SDend(sid);
00064   }
00065   return status_code;
00066 }
00067 
00073 MTKt_status MtkFileToPathFid( int32 sid,            
00074                   int *path              )
00075 {
00076   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00077   intn status;          /* HDF return status */
00078   int32 attr_index;     /* HDF attribute index */
00079   int32 path_tmp;       /* Temp path number */
00080 
00081   if (path == NULL)
00082     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00083 
00084   attr_index = SDfindattr(sid, "Path_number");
00085   if (attr_index == FAIL)
00086     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_SDFINDATTR_FAILED);
00087 
00088   status = SDreadattr(sid, attr_index, &path_tmp);
00089   if (status == FAIL)
00090     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_SDREADATTR_FAILED);
00091 
00092   *path = path_tmp;
00093 
00094   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00095 
00096 ERROR_HANDLE:
00097   return status_code;
00098 }
